Tutorial: countsplitting and Seurat

Source: vignettes/seurat_tutorial.Rmd
seurat_tutorial.Rmd

https://satijalab.org/seurat/articles/de_vignette.html

Install Seurat

If you don’t already have seurat, you will need to run:

if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("Seurat")
devtools::install_github('satijalab/seurat-data')

ANNA fun activity = can I get this data to work.

library(Seurat)
## Warning: package 'Seurat' was built under R version 4.1.2
## Attaching SeuratObject
library(SeuratData)

Load the data

We load the same SingleCellExperiment object
